name: Octopath Traveler: Wayfarer's Edition
summary:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Wayfarer's Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Octopath Traveler Sound Selections CD
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments
